sense.def:
Stavek ali dogodek je
meaningful
, kadar razumemo njegov pomen.

seg.quote: Nobody has ever explained electricity to me in a meaningful way.

sense.def:
Pogled, izraz ali pripomba je
meaningful
, kadar izraža neko stališče ali mnenje.

seg.quote: ‘Goodnight, and call again. Anytime,’ Boon added meaningfully.

sense.def:
Kar je
meaningful
, je resno in pomembno.

seg.quote: He felt the need to establish a more meaningful relationship with people.
At least you'd be filling your time meaningfully.
